Package.Name: Annoying Features Remover [Hangar Addons] {version} [by {author}]
Package.Author: NDO

Package.Name: Armor Inspector by protanki
Package.Description: Hangar Tank Armor Calculator for World of Tanks. \r\n\r\nThis mod allows you to analyze the armor of the selected tank in the hangar.

Package.Name: Armor Inspector by wotinspector.com (Online)
Package.Description: When the mod is installed properly, the button Armor Inspector will appear at the garage right under the tank and above the maintenance buttons. \nClick on it and you are redirected to the selected tank on wotinspector.com.\nShots from the last battle are autimatically accessible when you open Armor Inspector.

Package.Name: Auto-equip removeable equipment [by {author}]
Package.Author: OldSkool
Package.Description:
Simple Mod to automatically mount and demount removable devices on vehicles.

Teach this mod how it should work:
Equipment from the previous vehicle will be mounted after battle on the next vehicle.
(Binoculars, Toolbox and Camonet)

 by OldSkool

Package.Name: Crew auto-return [by {author}]
Package.Author: OldSkool
Package.Description:
OLDSKOOL'S AUTO RETURN CREW MOD
... IS AN EXTENSION TO AUTOSWITCH YOUR CREWS BETWEEN TANKS.


FEATURES:
• Autoswitch your crews between tanks.
• Easy enable or disable it for each of your tanks.
• Over 10 languages aresupported for now.
• Save configuration to safe file location to prevent issues.

Package.Name: Auxilium Garage Settings v{version} [by {author}]
Package.Author: ShuraBB

Package.Name: Auto-equip removeable equipment
Auto-Equip consumables
Package.Description: The function “AutoOutfit” - automatic installation of the equipment for the selected tank (first aid Kit, repair Kit, fire extinguisher, etc.);

Package.Name: Auto crew return
Package.Description: The function “AutoCrew” - automatic return of the last of the crew to the selected tank;

Package.Name: Gold Locker
Package.Description: Prevents the use of Gold

Package.Name: Free XP Locker
Package.Description: Prevents the use of Free XP.

Package.Name: remove wargaming statistics button
Package.Description: this allows you to remove the button for displaying the statistics of WG

Package.Name: Add L_CTRL+R keys to remove all removable equipment
Package.Description: Pressing left CTRL + R in the garage will remove all removable equipment from all your tanks. It will NOT remove "Complex Equipment" (Equipment that needs gold to be un-mounted)

Package.Name: Save last server
Package.Description: The function “saveLastServer” - remembering the last server which was played by the player;

Package.Name: Battle Hits Viewer in Hangar v{version} [by {author}]
Package.Author: P0LIR0ID
Package.Description: Mod allows you to consider all the hits on the tank received in battle.\nYou can configure the mod directly in the hangar.

Package.Name: Disable showing of annoying garage messages (gun mounted, welcome to server, etc.)
Package.Description: Disable showing of annoying garage messages (gun mounted, welcome to server, etc.)\n\nPart of Antitoxicity by ShuraBB

Package.Name: Expand Friends- & Blacklist
Package.Description: Expand your Friendslist and Blacklist

Package.Name: Antitoxicity´s expanded friends- and blacklist
Package.Description:
Expand your Friendslist and Blacklist


Part of Antitoxicity by ShuraBB

Package.Name: enable clearing of blacklist with F12 key
Package.Description: By pressing F12 in the garage you can clear your blacklist\nby\nShuraBB

Package.Name: Crew Extended (shows XP for leveling) [by {author}]
Package.Author: Spoter
Package.Description: Crew leveling, shows the number of battles and experience until the next studied crew perk (1%-step and for 100%.)

Package.Name: by WGMods (iZeberg)
Package.Description: just an alternative for spoter mods - keep invisible or maintain it on each patchday

Package.Name: Tooltip Pro [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes:
this is now part of the "little helper collection" (dependency).

can conflict with NDO hangar addons (promo prem vehicle option)
Package.Author: CHAMPi
Package.Description: Expands the list of tanks on which the equipment is installed (in hangar tips), \r\nshows the full selling price of modules, consumables and ammunition (in stock)

Package.Name: ModPack Support Button v{version} [by {author}]
Package.Author: Budyx69
Package.Description: With this Button you can jump to the Relhax Modpack chat channel in game, the Discord support server, and visit our official support Forums.\r\n\r\nby Budyx69

Package.Name: Left Side
Package.Description: ModpackButton by Budyx69: \nWith this Button you can jump to the Relhax Modpack chat channel in game, the Discord support server, and visit our official support Forums.

Package.Name: Right Side
Package.Description: ModpackButton by Budyx69: \nWith this Button you can jump to the Relhax Modpack chat channel in game, the Discord support server, and visit our official support Forums.

Package.Name: OfflineMode Launcher [by {author}]
Package.Author: alphasave1
Package.Description:
This mod can start maps offline.
There is no tank and no gui, only the blank map to explore!
Only Works From Login Screen
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to use:

1.Click the MOD list in the lower right corner of the login screen
2.Click on item OfflineMode Launcher
-> Launcher window opens
3.Select a map
4.Click the Load button
-> The map will load
5.Press the F key
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Keys:

WSAD: move camera
Numpad +/-: adjust FOV
Mouse Wheel: adjust speed
Escape: toggle mouse mode
F: toggle camera freeze mode
R: add new camera view point
0-7: change camera view point
N: move to previous camera view point
M: move to next camera view point
P: toggle post-precessing
C: toggle cinematic post-processing mode
T: toggle temporal AA
END: Game will quit
Alt+F4: , Game will quit.
PrtSc/SysRq: ScreenShot
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About camera speed:
1.Copy the engine_config.xml from res/ to res_mods/1.1.0.1
2.Open XML file,edit ui/straferate value.
3.Save,Close.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact：Twitter 
alphasave1
Special Thanks : 
chirimenspiral , koreanrandom’s MODders

Package.Name: RegionChanger
Replay Manager [by {author}]
Package.Author: WGMods
Package.Description:
Mod allows you to manage your game replays directly from the the game!

Main features of the mod:
- display in a convenient form all replays from the folder “replays”.
- sorting and filtering replays on various parameters, simplifying the search for the desired replay.
- viewing the results of the recorded battle in a convenient form.
- running the selected replay (is possible only after disconnecting from the server, and then restarting the client).
- upload replays to the site wotreplays.com and get a direct link to it.




by STL1te_P0LIR0ID 
German Translation by DOC73 

RU-Server: wotreplays.ru 
EU-Server: wotreplays.eu 
NA-Server: wotreplays.com

Package.Name: enable replays for the "Battle Royale" game mode
by OldSkool
Package.Description: This mod activates the replays of the Battle Royal.\r\nThus, rigger can be reported to the support.

Package.Name: Seller
Package.Description:
quicker selling of unused items

Warning!
Don´t check "compatible with vehicles"!
Only if you want to sell shells/consumables/modules fitting to vehicles in your garage - but in most cases that´s not what people want!


by JOVE

Package.Name: ScriptloaderPro v{version}
Package.Description:
Script Loader PRO is an improved version of the usual script loader. 
It shows in the hangar which scripts are properly loaded.
A message appears in the message center for faulty scripts.
- Show Full Message with scriptname
- Show Minimal with sum of the scripts
- Show only error in messagecenter
- Check if exist obsolate “cameranode.pyc” in res_mods folder
- better Show faults in python.log
- Spamfilter for python.log file (individually configurable according to type of message)


by Budyx69

Package.Name: No message at the messagecenter when loading scripts in res folder
Debug Mode
Package.Description: Enables the debug mode. Only use if your testing mods/ looking for errors.

Package.Name: Battlechat Filter Enable
Package.Description: only chat-msgs with "noob" get blocked

Package.Name: Filterlist (extended)
Package.Description: for a clean and friendly chat-experience this patch adds following words to battlechatfilter:\n\n"spotted","noob","clicker","idiot","coward","anal","anus","arse","ass","ballsack","balls","bastard","bitch","biatch","blowjob","blow job","bollock","bollok","boner","boob","bugger","bum","butt","buttplug","clitoris","cock","coon","crap","cunt","dick","dildo","fag","feck","fellate","fellatio","felching","fuck","f u c k","fudgepacker","fudge packer","flange","Goddamn","God damn","homo","jerk","jizz","knobend","knob end","labia","muff","nigger","nigga","penis","piss","poop","prick","pube","pussy","queer","scrotum","sex","slut","smegma","spunk","tit","tosser","turd","twat","vagina","wank","whore"

Package.Name: Simple Vehicle Stats [by {author}]
Package.Author: RaJCeL
Package.Description: These are vehicle parameters on single list.\r\n\r\nby RajCel

Package.Name: VehicleXP Extended [by {author}]
Package.Author: Izeberg
Package.Description:
This mod is calculating the amount of experience and battles before the next tank in the hangar.

You can see the amount of experience and battles required to investigate the next tank from the current one, as well as the amount of experience and battles for the tank to receive the “Elite” status.

The amount of experience near the key shows how much more you need to gain experience so that you can explore all the modules.
The experience near the golden star shows you the amount of experience needed to get the tank Elite status.
The experience near the silver star represents the required experience for exploring the next tank.
